sentence: Colgate-Palmolive Company ( CL ) will begin trading ex-dividend on October 18, 2018.
A cash dividend payment of $0.42 per share is scheduled to be paid on November 15, 2018.
Shareholders who purchased CL prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This marks the 3rd quarter that CL has paid the same dividend.
At the current stock price of $62.61, the dividend yield is 2.68%.
The previous trading day's last sale of CL was $62.61, representing a -19.64% decrease from the 52 week high of $77.91 and a 2.17% increase over the 52 week low of $61.28.
CL is a part of the Consumer Non-Durables sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever NV ( UN ).
CL's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $2.5.
Zacks Investment Research reports CL's forecasted earnings growth in 2018 as 4.57%, compared to an industry average of 7.6%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the CL Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
